Question: From the late 1980s, this person's routines focused on socio-cultural criticism of modern American society.
Hints: The book, chronicling most of this person's life and future plans (including the one-man show) was published in 2009.
In 1959, this person and Jack Burns began as a comedy team when both were working for radio station KXOL in Fort Worth, Texas.
This person began a weekly Fox sitcom, The ____ Show, in 1993, playing New York City taxicab driver George O'Grady.
